function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Narrow range of adaptation to thermal environment in winter for occupants in northern China","Impact":"Decreased thermal satisfaction and challenges in achieving high satisfaction in temperature control among northern Chinese occupants","Mitigation":"Improving insulation, optimizing heating systems, and providing personalized thermal comfort solutions","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, occupancy sensors, and building insulation materials","People":"Building occupants in northern China","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Differences in air quality satisfaction due to ventilation types in buildings in China","Impact":"Variation in indoor CO2 concentration and air quality satisfaction based on building ventilation types","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation and air quality monitoring systems, promoting natural ventilation in type A buildings, and improving mechanical ventilation in type B buildings","Technologies":"CO2 sensors, air purifiers, and ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants in China","Owner":"Building management, facility managers, and government agencies"}]}
